title: Shubh Diwali!
description: WSRA Children's Picture This 2021 Recommendation ListThe festival of lights is hereâ€•time to celebrate the New Year! Diwali has arrived! Rangoli art decorates the floor, and strings of flowers hang around the doors. Now it's time to ring the bells, light the lamps, and welcome the New Year with family and friends. A sweet introduction to the Hindu festival of lights.
author: Chitra Soundar
